title: The Good Apple Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Take-out, Bakery, British, English
description: Small cafe making 100% vegetarian and with a large percentage of vegan choices from toasted bagels, breakfasts, soups and salads to steaming bowls of noodle and daily specials. Nearly all traybakes and cakes are vegan friendly. Specialty teas and coffees. Laid back decor, mix and match furniture, free Wi-Fi, open plan kitchen. Opened Jun 2013.
